channel.title: Wilfrid's War on Wilfrid's War in Letters
channel.description: Recent content in Wilfrid's War on Wilfrid's War in Letters

item.title: 9-28-1916 Richard Buckley - Wilfred has been wounded
1-11-18 I feel like going to France
1-21-17 Jack Johnson Bounced Off My Bean
1-28-17 Details of Dependent Remittance Scheme to Ruby
10-29-16 You will end up in a workhouse
10-4-16 Hurrah I got a nice Blighty
11-13-16 Richard Buckley - Very Hard to Lose Such Men
11-15-18 At last the good news has come
11-26-16 The sisters are all good sports
11-3-16 My Wound Has Been Giving Me Considerable Pain
12-10-15 One of the Family is Enough
12-12-16 I Surely Have Found a Home Alright
12-7-16 Well Supplied with Cigarettes so why worry
12-7-16 William Miles The Only Two Left in This Battalion
2-1-17 I have assigned half my pay to you
2-2-17 Lieutenants get killed just the same as privates
2-27-16 With all my heart and soul
25-12-16 I got a box of chocolates from some girl
3-11-16 It All remains with myself now
3-4 and 11-1916 Finally Drafted for the Front
3-6-16 It will be nice to get back to a feather mattress
3-9-19 All the good jobs will be taken
4-10-17 Richard Buckley - How much life is left in the Huns
4-19-18 May be sent to France Send Money
4-27-17 Potatoes are a Thing of the Past
4-7-17 They are up against it now alright
5-26-16 Richard Buckley - In a Little Dugout
5-4-16 George Fairbairn- from Trench Dressing Station
5-5-17 Got over my Birthday all right
5-9-19 Hope Papa Lands me a Government Job
6-18-18 I have been marked fit now
6-19-17 Either a Blighty or an RIP
7-10-16 Buckley - A Stammer Caused by Nervousness
8-17-17 Papa could use his influence - Now declared Fit
8-29-16 Post Card - On Way to Somme
8-5-16 Should have him pinched as deserter
9-17-16 I May Not Be Home for Christmas
9-20-16 Richard Buckley - Giving the Hun No Rest
9-23-16 Written Day Before going Over the Parapet
9-29-16 George Fairbairn - His Wound Is a Dandy, Easy One
9-29-16 Telegram to A. Dunlop - Wilfrid wounded
9-5-16 Richard Buckley- glad my letters are interesting
9-6-16 I Will Have a Lot to Tell You
Reporting for the Neepawa Free Press
